title: Why does my launcher look like this?
body:
https://i.imgur.com/zSqKdRZ.png

I reinstalled Windows 10 and my now my launcher looks like this. I am on the new client and whatever, I'm not sure why it says this. How do I change it to normal?

replies.body: After reinstalling windows you might need to update to the new client again. Let that update do it's thing, and hit me back up if you encounter any errors along the way.

As far as I know, this is the new client, that's why I'm confused. This doesn't download anything besides updates, and as far as I know there isn't an update waiting to be installed. I only reinstalled like 2 months ago, so I should have downloaded the new launcher and not the old one. Is there something I'm not doing, or did I not download the right installer?

For reference, this is what my launcher looks like when I log in https://i.imgur.com/aZ5bYbx.png

Thanks for taking the time to respond :)

That is indeed the updated client! I thought previously you had mentioned being stuck on that client update, but that doesn't look to be the case.

Sooooo I'm honestly a little confused. Your client looks like it's functioning normally, is there anything that been giving you any errors?
Well no, it's just ugly to see that every time I launch. I don't even know what other people see but it's better than a client telling me it's doing a year old update.
